revised_title: Plant Breeding for Crop Improvement in Britain: Advances and Objectives
tldr: The author discusses the importance of plant breeding for crop improvement in Britain, focusing on the methods, achievements, and objectives of the industry. They highlight the role of technological advancements and improved crop varieties in increasing agricultural productivity and efficiency. The author also emphasizes the need for further development of high-yielding varieties to meet the growing demand for food and reduce reliance on imported plant foods.
